CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sunstone Desert relative to Golden Delta?
SRP.A: Sunstone Desert is {below} Golden Delta in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Golden Delta relative to Silverwood Forest?
SRP.A: Golden Delta is {above} Silverwood Forest in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sunstone Desert relative to Veridian Plains?
SRP.A: Sunstone Desert is {above} Veridian Plains in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total construction starts?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Silverwood Forest}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total construction starts?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Veridian Plains}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Veridian Plains's minimum Construction Starts in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Veridian Plains's minimum Construction Starts is in {1965}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Azure Coast's minimum Construction Starts in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Azure Coast's minimum Construction Starts is in {1966}.

NC.Q: Was the total Construction Starts in 1954 higher or lower than in 1966?
NC.A: The total construction starts in 1954 was {lower} than in 1966.

NC.Q: Between 1957 and 1966, was the average total Construction Starts higher or lower than between 1955 and 1959?
NC.A: The average total construction starts between 1957 and 1966 was {higher} than between 1955 and 1959.

NC.Q: Between 1955 and 1960, did the total Construction Starts experience a larger or smaller change than between 1956 and 1964?
NC.A: The change in total construction starts between 1955 and 1960 was {smaller} than between 1956 and 1964.

NC.Q: Was the total Construction Starts in 1960 higher or lower than in 1966?
NC.A: The total construction starts in 1960 was {lower} than in 1966.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Silverwood Forest} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Shadowfen and Crimson Peaks first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Shadowfen and Crimson Peaks first exchanged leading positions in {1955}.
